Description:
OPPORTUNITY ON RIX!
This perfect 4050 sqm rectangle comes complimentary with an enormous amount of opportunity!
Adjacent to the prestigious Maranatha Cristian College and opposite a brand new Arcadia Development, there isn't a better spot in Officer to invest.
The land, currently zoned medium density, invites an abundance of possibility, from medical hubs to childcare centres, to a residential/unit development (all S.T.C.A).
Currently rented out and providing a steady income.

Length: up to 6 months
Deposit amount: 100k
Price: $1.65M
Don't miss out on this one.

Description:
LOCATION. SIZE. AFFORDABILITY. WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT?
"One of the most affordable titled blocks in the 3809 postcode."
The near flat block in the ever-popular Grandvue Estate will be sure to impress. Spanning over 430sqm with a large frontage, this titled block is ready for you.
The unique layout offers the chance to secure your dream home while still providing side access for caravans/trailers and on top of that you still get a decent backyard.
A fire-pit with benches or a play area with a sand pit would be an ideal way to utilise the back area of the block and round out the property.
With house and land packages available on the block, call now before this one is snapped up.

Description:
Ready to Build Your Dream Home
Located in one of the most sought-after estates in Officer, this titled block is fantastic opportunity to build your dream home within a well established community. Land size of approximately 304sqm, with 14m frontage and close to all desired amenities this magnificent parcel of land surely impress you.
Close proximity to park lands, walking tracks, picnic areas, reputable schools, transport and shopping Centres. Short drive to M1 Freeway access , Princes Highway and Officer Train Station.
If you are a qualified first home buyer , build your dream home here and claim First Home Owner Grant $10K and Home Builder grant $25K.
Be quick to enquire not to miss this opportunity.
ONLY one thing left to do...

Description:
Grand Living in Grandvue!!
Welcome to a quality built 3-year-old home, designed with families of all sizes in mind. This stunning home has a perfect layout that incorporates open plan living making it a versatile home for all buyers and their individual needs.
Accommodation needs are fulfilled with a large master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, plus three further sizable bedrooms sharing the bright and spacious family bathroom.
Further notable features include; 9ft high ceilings, fully tiled bathroom, solar hot water, ducted heating, extra-large garage.
Close proximity to schools, shops and parkland
Living room plus theatre room
open plan Kitchen with walk in pantry
Master bedroom with WIR and ensuite
3 further bedrooms all with double built-in-robes
Modern family bathroom
Extra-large double garage with internal access and rear roller door to the back yard
Ducted heating plus 2 x split system air conditioners
Solar hot water
This meticulously kept home is only moments away from St Clare's Primary School, St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Kindergarten and just a short drive to Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia train station, freeway entrance and opposite beautiful rolling hills complete with its own resident kangaroos.
There are too many inclusions to write about, so please book your private inspection now to avoid the disappointment of missing out on this beautiful family home.
Insights: 1 Kiama Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
LUXURY FAMILY HOME IN THE HEART OF OFFICER
This home truly has been maintained to an immaculate standard. With a striking façade and well-tailored floor plan, this high-quality residence awaits you.
Downstairs features open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, island bench, caesarstone benchtops, walk- in pantry, plenty of cupboard space and large main living area, all overlooking the meals area. Entertaining is made easy with sliding door access from the meals/kitchen area to the huge fully undercover decking for all year round entertaining.
Upstairs there is plenty of room for everyone with a large second living area and 4 bedrooms. The master bedroom includes WIR and full ensuite with twin vanity. Bedrooms two, three and four are all serviced by the main bathroom which is finished with quality fixtures and fittings.
Added features include separate powder room downstairs, laundry, quality carpets, heating, cooling, double garage, alarm system, and much more.
Perfectly located in the heart of Officer and within walking distance to Officer Train Station, an array of primary and secondary schools, Potters Grove Estate Park, Officers new proposed town centre, and much more.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
** Please be advised due to Stage 4 Covid 19 restrictions we're unable to conduct Private Inspections until further notice, but we encourage you to register your interest now so we contact you immediately to arrange a private inspection once restrictions are lifted**

Description:
TITLED LAND - Large Block at Arcadia
Welcome to Arcadia - the heart of Officer. Set in one of Melbournes fastest growing suburbs, Arcadia is a friendly community that perfectly balances natural surroundings with all the convenience of urban living.
All located within the development or just a few short minutes away:
- The future Officer town centre
- Officer and Cardinia Rd train stations
- Officer Secondary College, Officer Specialist School, Bridgewood Primary School and another future primary school
- An abundance of parks, reserves and open spaces
- Future Officer South Road Freeway interchange
Buy today with just 5% deposit.
The Arcadia Land Sales Office is currently closed but we have phone and video appointments available. Please register on this listing or call 1800 900 000. We look forward to speaking with you.

Description:
3 LIVING ZONES BIG AND BEAUTIFUL
Designed and executed to entertain all the family needs, you will have a choice of three separate living zones.
As you enter you will love this impressive modern façade, wide entrance hall and high ceilings throughout the home.
At the front of the home boasts the oversized master bedroom which includes full ensuite and walk in robe. To the right of the hall you will find one of the living zones which could be easily be converted into a full threate room space. Moving through to the heart of the home is the open plan main living and dining zone that is enhanced with the natural light beaming in. The gourmet kitchen overlooks this zone and features stone benchtop, 900mm oven, dishwasher, WIP and plenty of storage space.
Conveniently located in a separate wing of the home is the additional bedrooms which all include BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom. The third living zone provides a great space for a kids play area or a traditional lounge setting. Both the main zone and this area have sliding doors that flow out onto a large undercover alfresco and massive backyard giving enough room to entertain and the kids to play. An added bonus of the backyard is site gate access which is great for those with a trailer, boat or caravan.
There is simply not enough homes that come onto the market of this calibre and size, and this is not an opportunity to be missed.
Added features include but are not limited large laundry, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, remote controlled double garage, block out blinds, beautiful gardens and much more.
Situated in the popular Arcadia Estate, just minutes from prestigious schools, public transport, shops and an array of parks and playgrounds. The location is convenient and provides a great lifestyle for your family.

Description:
Modern Townhouses, Great Location
Located in the sought after Arena Estate are 2 modern double storey townhouses with 2 living areas & private rear yards.
Property features include:
*3 large bedrooms, master with triple built in robe & ensuite (huge shower), bedrooms 2 & 3 with double built in robes & serviced by the main bathroom
*Large downstairs living room with tiled meals area plus upstairs retreat
*Modern kitchen with stainless steel oven, gas cooktop, rangehood & dishwasher, ample cupboard space
*3 toilets including 1 downstairs, high ceilings, reverse cycle split systems on both levels plus panel heaters upstairs, downlights throughout, Holland blinds, double linen cupboard, quality security doors
*Double garage with remote door & direct access to the home, good size rear courtyard with paved area
Excellent location walking distance to Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside Recreation Reserve & public transport & within close proximity to top schools & M1 freeway access.
If you are looking for low maintenance living with no body corporate this is it! Buy one or buy both, owner occupy or invest, the choice is yours.
Please contact Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830 or geoff.powell@grantsea.com.au to inspect.

Description:
RE: UPTO $35K IN GRANTS AVAILABLE WITH THIS HOUSE & LAND PACKAGE !
With little to no titles blocks available in Officer for sale, this opportunity is one not to miss. Set to title in the middle of August 2020 with a plan and builder ready to go
you can not only claim the available grants on offer but also move into your new home very quickly.
Located in the Arcadia estate in officer, the block is close to everything you will ever need.
Short Drive to
- Officer train Station
- Officer secondary college,
- An upcoming primary school
- Freeway interchange
- Child care center
- Stay connected with easy access to Rix Rd & Officer South Rd
- Great parkland and walking tracks.
The Fixed price house comes with high end inclusions.You will be impressed by the location and the quality of the finishing product. Inclusive of a large open plan living/meals space, luxurious design of the kitchen will be the masterpiece of this home with stone bench-top, ample storage spaces, stainless steel cook-top, oven and a spacious laundry.
LUXURY INCLUSIONS
- Heating & Cooling System
- 2.7m High Ceilings
- 900mm Free standing Technica Oven (stainless steel)
- 5 Gas burner Cook top (stainless steel)
- 900mm Range hood (stainless steel)
- 600mm stainless steel dishwasher (stainless steel)
- 600X600 porcelain glazed tiles
- 40mm stone benches to kitchen
- Floor to Ceiling tiles to bathrooms and powder room
- Square set cornersis to all main living areas
- Down-lights to living areas
Within close range of many schools, amenities, parks and reserves, this is your chance to call it HOME in the Prestigious and well known suburb of Officer. Located in a private and peaceful neighborhood this property is perfect for the first home buyer looking to take advantage of almost $35k worth of government grants that will be available !
Call Rinaldi on 0422 054 137 to get more information and reviews the plans before this goes.
Images for Illustration purposes only.

Description:
Take a Look-in at Brooklyn!
Presenting a terrific opportunity in the Park Central estate Officer with this striking 4 bedroom home! Instantly you feel right at home with timber look flooring and beautiful modern tonings throughout!
Separate living spaces include the formal lounge at the front of the home, flowing to the large open plan family living and dining zone. Elegant kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, the stone bench offers ample space for preparation and an abundance of cupboard space for all appliances.
Boasting a large master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite, the secondary bedrooms are all terrific size and have built in robes. Additional features gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, low maintenance gardens front and rear and a double lock up garage with internal access.
The location is simply amazing in a developing area and the astute buyer with a view to future will appreciate just how good it is! Already a short walk to the parks, cafes, future town centre, private and public schools, with the Officer and Beaconsfield train stations both very easy to access rounds out an already impressive package!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised. If you prefer to view by Private Inspection please click the 'Book Inspection' button to register your preferred inspection or contact the agent to organize a suitable time. The health and safety of our clients and staff is paramount and we are closely following the advice of the Australian Government and World Health Organisation.

Description:
MODERN & STYLISH HOME
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS WELCOMED!
Offering an appealing design, this home is well suited to a downsizer, first home buyer or investor.
Allowing for an open plan design, the home comprises of a contemporary kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtop, an abundance of cupboard space and is integrated with the open plan living and dining zone.
The master bedroom is located towards the rear of the home and features walk in robe and full ensuite, all additional bedrooms include built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Sliding doors lead outdoors onto a neat backyard offering low maintenance living.
Added features include study, split system cooling/heating, ducted heating, laundry, remote controlled double garage and much more.
Located in the Savannah Estate, just minutes from prestigious schools, Savannah Estate Park and Playground, Officer Train Station, Officer's New Proposed Town Centre as well as the M1 Freeway entrance.
With Officer in high demand, this is your chance to secure an excellent home.

Prestigious Arcadia Estate Estimate Title in October 2020*
Benefits of Buying this Land!
- You are saving $3000 dollars
- Only $10,000 Deposit Required
- You will be eligible for $25,000 government building grant as by the time you sign the building contract you will be all ready for you to start building*.
Land Size is 12.50 x 32 400m2
Selling for Contract price $346,000.
$10,000 deposit required.
Estimate Land titling in October 2020*.
As one of the most popular new masterplanned communities in Officer, Arcadia boasts three new schools, a childcare centre, and is walking distance to two existing train stations and the future Officer town centre.
Residents also enjoy direct access to both Princes Freeway and Princes Highway, with a new freeway interchange commencing in 2020 to make life even easier.
Disclaimer: J&J Realtors does not Guarantee title date and Home Builders Grant.
We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own enquires and refer to the due diligence check-list provided by Consumer Affairs. Description:
IT'S GOT THE LOT
Positioned in the Arcadia estate Officer, this beautifully presented 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home will be well suited to young families, low maintenance lifestyles and investors alike.
With a very spacious floor plan there is plenty of room to move. 2 separate living areas, include a formal lounge to the front of the home and stunning open plan kitchen complete with Caesar stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including 900ml oven and gas stove top, plus dishwasher. Entertain or gather as a family as the kitchen area overlooks the main lounge and dining. 3 spacious bedrooms, including master with walk through robes and full ensuite. Whilst the remaining 2 bedrooms come complete with built in robes. Comfort all year round with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout and internal access to the double lockup garage on remote.
Enjoy the summer months with a beautifully landscaped outdoor area of approx 426m2 complete with undercover alfresco and outdoor spa (optional).
Local Childcare, Secondary and Specialist schools within a short distance and walking distance to the local Bridgewood Primary.
Insights: 17 Shaw Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
First home buyers, retirees & investors
Open home inspections are now available again. There is currently a 10 person limit so it is important to register prior to inspection. Those registered for open home will be given preference over those who have not. Please contact me to confirm your booking or call to organise a private viewing.
This genuine four bedroom home offers easy access to Arena shopping centre, Cardinia Railway station and located within the Officer Secondary School zoning.
Features include:
- Master with walk in robe & ensuite with double robes to the remaining bedrooms
- Open plan living & dining area
- Excellent kitchen with stone bench tops & stainless appliances including dishwasher
- High ceilings, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Alfresco & double garage with internal access.
Currently leased until 31 August 2020 its a perfect opportunity for first home buyers, retirees & investors. Make a move on this, it will be snapped up quickly!
Insights: 30 Georgetown Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
